S

setActivityTime(int, int) - Method in class edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_scheduler.course.Activity
sets the Activity's start and end time if meeting days is 'A' end and start time must be 0 if either time is less than 0000 or greater than 2359, throws illegal argument exception if end time is less than start time, throws illegal argument exception if minutes is greater than 59
setCredits(int) - Method in class edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_scheduler.course.Course
sets the Course's credit hours if field is less than 1 or grater than 5, throws IllegalArgumentException
setEventDetails(String) - Method in class edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_scheduler.course.Event
set the Event details
setInstructorId(String) - Method in class edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_scheduler.course.Course
sets the Course's instructor id if null or empty string, throws IllegalArgumentException
setMeetingDays(String) - Method in class edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_scheduler.course.Activity
sets the Activity's meeting days
setMeetingDays(String) - Method in class edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_scheduler.course.Course
sets the Course's meeting days if contains character other than 'MTWHFA' throws illegal argument exception if contains 'A', it must be the only character or throws illegal argument exception
setMeetingDays(String) - Method in class edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_scheduler.course.Event
sets the Event's meeting days if contains character other than 'MTWHFSUA' throws illegal argument exception if contains 'A', it must be the only character or throws illegal argument exception
setSection(String) - Method in class edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_scheduler.course.Course
set the Course's section if the field is null, empty string, or not three digits long, an IllegalArgumentsException is thrown
setTitle(String) - Method in class edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_scheduler.course.Activity
sets the Activity title If the name is null, an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
setTitle(String) - Method in class edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_scheduler.scheduler.WolfScheduler
set title of schedule throw illegal exception if null or empty String
setUp() - Method in class edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_scheduler.scheduler.WolfSchedulerTest
Resets course_records.txt for use in other tests.
setWeeklyRepeat(int) - Method in class edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_scheduler.course.Event
set Event repeat
